languages.text: "Этот флейтист не так прост, каким хочет казаться, {name}. Мне крайне интересно, чем он на самом деле здесь занимается. Я распоряжусь, чтобы к нему приставили наблюдателей".

traits.locale_text: "Этот флейтист не так прост, каким хочет казаться, {name}. Мне крайне интересно, чем он на самом деле здесь занимается, и у меня есть пара способов тихо это выяснить".

languages.text: "This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."
languages.original_text: "Этот флейтист не так прост, каким хочет казаться, {name}. Мне крайне интересно, чем он на самом деле здесь занимается. Я распоряжусь, чтобы к нему приставили наблюдателей".

traits.locale_text: "This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."
"This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."
"This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."
"This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."
"This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."
"This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."

languages.text: «Este flautista no es tan simplón como aparenta ser, {name}. Tengo mucha curiosidad por saber qué ha venido a hacer aquí. Haré que lo vigilen».
languages.original_text: "This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."

traits.locale_text: «Este flautista no es tan simplón como aparenta ser, {name}. Tengo mucha curiosidad por saber qué ha venido a hacer aquí. Haré que lo vigilen».

languages.text: 「このフルート奏者は、見かけほど単純ではありません、{name}。彼がここで何をしているのかが今一番知りたい。彼に監視をつけよう」
languages.original_text: "This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."

traits.locale_text: 「このフルート奏者は、見かけほど単純ではありません、{name}。彼がここで何をしているのかが今一番知りたい。彼に監視をつけよう」

languages.text: “这个吹笛人并不像看起来这么简单，{name}。我非常好奇他在这种地方干什么，我会派人监视他。”
languages.original_text: "This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."

traits.locale_text: “这个吹笛人并不像看起来这么简单，{name}。我非常好奇他在这种地方干什么，我会派人监视他。”

languages.text: "Dieser Flötenspieler ist nicht so einfach, wie er tut, {name}. Ich wüsste zu gern, was er hier wirklich macht. Ich werde ihn überwachen lassen."
languages.original_text: "This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Flötenspieler ist nicht so einfach, wie er tut, {name}. Ich wüsste zu gern, was er hier wirklich macht. Ich werde ihn überwachen lassen."

languages.text: « Ce joueur de flûte n'est pas aussi modeste qu'il le prétend, {name}. J'aimerais bien savoir ce qu'il fait réellement ici. Je vais le faire surveiller. »
languages.original_text: "This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."

traits.locale_text: « Ce joueur de flûte n'est pas aussi modeste qu'il le prétend, {name}. J'aimerais bien savoir ce qu'il fait réellement ici. Je vais le faire surveiller. »

languages.text: "Bu flütçü, iddia ettiği kadar sıradan birisi değil {name}. Burada gerçekten ne yaptığını son derece merak ediyorum. Onu gözetim altında tutacağım."
languages.original_text: "This flute player is not as simple as he pretends to be, {name}. I am most curious to know what he's really doing here. I will have him monitored."
